properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT WHERE POST_AD_PAID = 1

SELECT distinct a.POST_AD_CODE , a.POST_AD_DATE , a.AD_CODE , e.AD_NAME , e.AD_PRICE * POST_AD_WEEK as AD_PRICE , a.POST_CODE , a.P_METHOD_CODE , F.P_METHOD_NAME , c.B_CODE , d.B_NAME , d.B_ADDRESS , d.B_ADDRESS , d.B_NUMBER FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT a, POST b, HR c, BUSINESS d, AD e, PAYMENT_METHOD f WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE and b.HR_ID = c.HR_ID and c.B_CODE = d.B_CODE and a.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE and a.P_METHOD_CODE = f.P_METHOD_CODE and POST_AD_PAID = 1 group by POST_AD_DATE order by POST_AD_DATE DESC LIMIT ?, 10

SELECT distinct a.POST_AD_CODE , a.POST_AD_DATE , a.AD_CODE , e.AD_NAME , e.AD_PRICE * POST_AD_WEEK as AD_PRICE , a.POST_CODE , a.P_METHOD_CODE , F.P_METHOD_NAME , c.B_CODE , d.B_NAME , d.B_ADDRESS , d.B_ADDRESS , d.B_NUMBER , g.B_CATEGORY_LEVEL , d.B_OWNER , now() , a.POST_AD_WEEK , e.AD_PRICE FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT a, POST b, HR c, BUSINESS d, AD e, PAYMENT_METHOD f, BUSINESS_CATEGORY g WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE and b.HR_ID = c.HR_ID and c.B_CODE = d.B_CODE and a.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE and a.P_METHOD_CODE = f.P_METHOD_CODE and d.B_CATEGORY_CODE = g.B_CATEGORY_CODE and a.POST_AD_PAID = 1 and a.POST_CODE = ?

SELECT distinct a.POST_AD_CODE , a.POST_AD_DATE , a.AD_CODE , e.AD_NAME , e.AD_PRICE * POST_AD_WEEK as AD_PRICE , a.POST_CODE , a.P_METHOD_CODE , F.P_METHOD_NAME , c.B_CODE , d.B_NAME , d.B_ADDRESS , d.B_NUMBER FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT a, POST b, HR c, BUSINESS d, AD e, PAYMENT_METHOD f WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE and b.HR_ID = c.HR_ID and c.B_CODE = d.B_CODE and a.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE and a.P_METHOD_CODE = f.P_METHOD_CODE and POST_AD_PAID = 1 and month(POST_AD_DATE) = ? group by POST_AD_DATE order by POST_CODE ASC LIMIT ?, 10

SELECT distinct a.POST_AD_CODE , a.POST_AD_DATE , a.AD_CODE , e.AD_NAME , e.AD_PRICE * POST_AD_WEEK as AD_PRICE , a.POST_CODE , a.P_METHOD_CODE , F.P_METHOD_NAME , c.B_CODE , d.B_NAME , d.B_ADDRESS , d.B_NUMBER FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT a, POST b, HR c, BUSINESS d, AD e, PAYMENT_METHOD f WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE and b.HR_ID = c.HR_ID and c.B_CODE = d.B_CODE and a.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE and a.P_METHOD_CODE = f.P_METHOD_CODE and POST_AD_PAID = 1 and d.B_NAME = ? group by POST_AD_DATE order by POST_CODE ASC LIMIT ?, 10

SELECT distinct count(*) over() FROM POST_AD_PAYMENT a, POST b, HR c, BUSINESS d, AD e, PAYMENT_METHOD f WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE and b.HR_ID = c.HR_ID and c.B_CODE = d.B_CODE and a.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE and a.P_METHOD_CODE = f.P_METHOD_CODE and POST_AD_PAID = 1 and d.B_NAME = ? group by POST_AD_DATE

SELECT distinct count(*) over() FROM post_ad_payment a, POST b, HR c, BUSINESS d, AD e, PAYMENT_METHOD f WHERE a.POST_CODE = b.POST_CODE and b.HR_ID = c.HR_ID and c.B_CODE = d.B_CODE and a.AD_CODE = e.AD_CODE and a.P_METHOD_CODE = f.P_METHOD_CODE and POST_AD_PAID = 1 and month(POST_AD_DATE) = ? group by POST_AD_DATE
